LanguageData.Yockay_Atropos.RaidAnnounceHour: A raid comes in about {0} hours.
LanguageData.Yockay_Atropos.RaidAnnounceDays: A raid comes in about {0} days.
LanguageData.Yockay_Atropos.MinDaysPassedExplain1: minDaysPassed: Number of days from the start of settlement to the first raid.
LanguageData.Yockay_Atropos.CycleDaysExplain1: cycleDays: Interval at which raids occur.
LanguageData.Yockay_Atropos.AnnounceBeforeDaysExplain: announceBeforeDays: How many days' notice of the raid. 0 is no announce.
Unit: day, min: 0, max: half of cycleDays
